verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%H7919>considers<s%> the <S%H1800>poor:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H4422>deliver<s%> him in <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7451>trouble.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H8104>preserve<s%> him, and keep him <S%H2421>alive;<s%> and he shall be <S%H833>blessed<s%> on the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and you will not <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him to the <S%H5315>will<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5582>strengthen<s%> him on the <S%H6210>bed<s%> of <S%H1741>languishing:<s%> you will <S%H2015>make<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4904>bed<s%> in his <S%H2483>sickness.<s%>
I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to me: <S%H7495>heal<s%> my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> for I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against you.
My <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> of me, <S%H4970>When<s%> shall he <S%H4191>die,<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6>perish?<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> me, he <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H7723>vanity:<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6908>gathers<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> to itself; when he <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> he <S%H1696>tells<s%> it.
<S%H3605>All<s%> that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H3907>whisper<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me: <S%H5921>against<s%> me do they <S%H2803>devise<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>
An <S%H1100>evil<s%> <S%H1697>disease,<s%> say they, <S%H3332>sticks<s%> fast to him: and now that he <S%H7901>lies<s%> he shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%>

<S%H1571>Yes,<s%> my own <S%H7965>familiar<s%> friend, in <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H982>trusted,<s%> which did <S%H398>eat<s%> of my <S%H3899>bread,<s%> has <S%H1431>lifted<s%> up his <S%H6119>heel<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me.
But you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to me, and <S%H6965>raise<s%> me up, that I may <S%H7999>requite<s%> them.
By <S%H2063>this<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you <S%H2654>favor<s%> me, <S%H3588>because<s%> my <S%H341>enemy<s%> does not <S%H7321>triumph<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me.
And as for me, you <S%H8551>uphold<s%> me in my <S%H8537>integrity,<s%> and <S%H5324>set<s%> me before your <S%H6440>face<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%> and to <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%> <S%H543>Amen,<s%> and <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
